messages.title: A Strong Voice for you
messages.content: It's been a privilege to be your MP since 2010. I've seen first-hand how politics can make a difference. That's why I campaigned for change on issues you raised with me, like tackling rip-off payday lenders.

messages.title: A Labour Government will:
messages.content: Scrap the Bedroom Tax, which punishes the poor, disabled and vulnerable.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in our future. Our offer for the next generation.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will cut tuition fees from £9,000 to £6,000, and increase grants for maintenance by £400, helping half of all students.
Growing inequality ill serves our society - and it'll get worse if the Tories are re-elected.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A better deal for renters - and more homes for all
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will ban letting agents from charging you rip-off fees, and ensure homes are secure, warm, well-maintained.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Don't let the Tories back in.

issues.education: Paul Blomfield - critical of the tuition fee policy.
issues.environment: Paul Blomfield - active on tackling climate change.
issues.health: Paul Blomfield - opposed NHS privatisation, low pay for carers, and climate change.
issues.socialWelfare: Scrap the Bedroom Tax, which punishes the poor, disabled and vulnerable.

housing.content: Labour will ban letting agents from charging you rip-off fees and ensure homes are secure, warm, well-maintained.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you re-elect me I'll continue to speak up for all of you in Parliament, and work with you to create the fairer society we need.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigned for change on issues like tackling rip-off payday lenders.

contactInformation.address: Sheffield Central Labour Party, The Trades & Labour Club, Talbot Street, Sheffield, S2 2TG

endorsements.endorsement: Paul is a fantastic constituency MP. He’s campaigned on lots of local issues – like speaking up for local GP surgeries – which are under real threat by tax dodging companies avoiding NHS contributions.
Paul is a real champion for Sheffield and campaigns for every community. We need more MPs like him.
Young people have been screwed over by the Government. Nick Clegg promised to protect them. We've been failed by a generation of politicians who promised one thing, only to do another.

images.caption: Re-Elect Paul Blomfield as our MP for Sheffield Central
